channel.title: CVE Feed for patriksimek -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for patriksimek -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-30547|2023-04-17T21:42:10.514Z -- patriksimek -- vm2
item.description: vm2 is a sandbox that can run untrusted code with whitelisted Node's built-in modules. There exists a vulnerability in exception sanitization of vm2 for versions up to 3.9.16, allowing attackers to raise an unsanitized host exception inside `handleException()` which can be used to escape the sandbox and run arbitrary code in host context. This vulnerability was patched in the release of version `3.9.17` of `vm2`. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability. Users are advised to upgrade.
